transcript:
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji. Ji. Good evening, ma'am. I am calling from Gulshan Mishra Lagate se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji, Gulshan Mishra Lagate. Okay.
Executive: Ji. Ma'am, main Priyanka baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Ma'am, actually na aapki taraf se concern raise hua tha. Right? To aap mujhe batayenge aapko kya issue aa raha hai ma'am services ke regarding?
Customer: Ji, koi client.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Koi bhi client reply nahi karta. Aur ek complaint maine ye bhi ki thi ke jo isne buyleads ke andar hume bataya tha clients, wo fraud nikla hai. Hamara maal chala gaya lekin paise nahi diye.
Executive: To ma'am aapne phir advance payment pe karna chahiye tha na. Kyunki hum to hamesha apne suppliers ko bolte hain wo advance payment me kaam kare. Hum kabhi unko suggest hi nahi karte hain ki aap pehle product bhej ke payment
Customer: Dijiye. Ye to hum hamesha bolte hain ma'am.
Customer: Ji ma'am, maine half payment liya tha, half payment baki tha.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Main saath saath me bol rahi hu aapke saath.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To hum log kya ke fraud me bhi thodi na IndiaMART wale rakhte hain.
Executive: Kya ma'am?
Customer: Fraud hoga hume thodi na pata tha ma'am.
Executive: Nahi nahi, bilkul ma'am nahi pata. But ma'am dekhiye online platform to aisa hai ki humko sari cheeze proper dekh ke hi karni padengi. Isliye hum kabhi kisi bhi supplier ko nahi bolte hain ki aap advance payment pe kaam mat kariye. Hum hamesha advance payment pe hi kaam karne ka advice unko dete hain. Right? Aur dusra issue aap jo bata rahe ho ki ma'am buyers reply hi nahi karte, to hum kis tarike se aap follow kar rahe ho, aap mujhe ek baar ye batayenge?
Customer: Ji ma'am, wo buyleads use karte hain, phir unko contact bhi karte hain. Wo log phone pick up bhi karte hain ma'am. Phir wo hamari price decide bhi ho jati hai ki theek hai hum ye price ke andar suitable hain. Hamara location ye hai, aapko hum ye address denge. But aap mujhe pehle ek photo share kar dijiye. Hum dekh lete hain. Phir hum photo share kar dete hain to wo log phir message hi nahi karte.
Executive: Ma'am dekhiye online platform me aapko bhi pata hai ki kitna competition hai. Agar wo message seen karke chhod de rahe hain to ma'am aapko teen se char baar unse follow up lena padega ma'am. Samne se kabhi koi buyer nahi karta hai.
Customer: Ji, ji bataiye.
Customer: Haan. Aur phir hum phir se phone karte the ki theek hai main abhi dekh leti hu, theek hai. Aisa keh ke phir se phone rakh dete the. Uske baad phir unka koi response nahi aata. Phir phone bhi pick up nahi karte aur na hi wo hamare messages dekhte hain.
Executive: Theek hai, main ye dekhti hu. Ma'am dekhiye follow up aapko thoda sa zyada karna padega. Kyunki ma'am pata hai issue kya aa raha hai? Kyunki aapke alawa buylead ek, jaisa ki humne aapko pehle bhi bataya hua hai ki ek buylead jo hai paanch logo ke paas jati hai, theek hai? Char logo ke paas jati hai ya paanch logo ke paas jati hai. To ma'am agar aapne ek baar usko message karke chhod diya, theek hai? Baki ke jo char supplier agar wo buyer ke connect me hain ya contact me hain ma'am, to wo aapse zyada follow up le rahe hain to deal ma'am waha convert ho ja rahi hai aur deal convert ho ja rahi hai to phir buyer aapko reply nahi kar raha hai. To major issue yaha pe aa raha hai ma'am.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Right? To ma'am aapko na proper ek to proper follow up karna padega, theek hai? Ki buyer ko aapko call bhi karna padega ma'am, message bhi karna padega. Ki sari cheeze aapko karni padengi. Theek hai? Uske baad hi ma'am aapko proper
Customer: Ji ji ji. Achha ma'am ye bataiye kitna abhi abhi tak conversion mila hai aapko IndiaMART se?
Customer: Itna khaas nahi. Starting ke andar jo hai beech me char mahine bilkul bhi nahi, ek single order bhi nahi tha. Abhi jo hamare purane clients jo hamare paas se sample lete the, wo abhi teen char teen char bracelet le lete hain.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay. To jaise aapne 33,040 invest kiya tha IndiaMART me, to abhi tak kitna conversion abhi tak aapko mila hai ma'am?
Customer: Um.
Customer: 20,000 tak hi mila hoga.
Executive: 20,000 ka hi abhi tak aapko conversion mila hai?
Customer: Ji, itna hi mila hoga.
Executive: Okay. To ek kaam karti hu ma'am, aapki jo account manager hai Tohid unka number hai na aapke paas?
Customer: Ji. Baat hoti rehti hai meri unke saath.
Executive: Okay, to main ek kaam karti hu, main Tohid ko bolti hu kuch buyleads aapko bheje. Jaha se chances hai ki aapki deal convert ho sakti hai, theek hai? Jaise ma'am aapki waha se kuch buyleads convert hoti hai to aap humko feedback dijiyega ki kaisi buyleads aapko aa rahi hai. Ye to hum kar sakte hain na? Ki agar main Tohid ko bolu aapko kuch kuch buyleads agar aapko WhatsApp pe share kare to?
Customer: Ji ma'am, wo beech me kari thi. Buyleads to aati achhi aati bhi hai. Koi baar achhi aa bhi jati hai. Hum baat bhi kar lete hain. Aaj subah hi hamari ek Priyanka Jain se baat hui hai.
Executive: Ji waha se aap consume kar sakte ho.
Customer: Okay. Ek minute, sorry. Priyanka nahi tha. Main dekh lo ek minute. Wait.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ek Shipra karke hai. Uske saath hamari baat chal rahi thi. 50 piece chahiye tha unko seven chakra ke. Unko humne bola ki ye retail price hai, aapko 50 piece chahiye honge to hum aapko wholesale price me de denge. Kehte theek hai. Phir abhi humne phone kiya to kehte theek hai main aapko list bhej rahi hu. Ab phir tak unka kuch reply nahi aaya.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai. Aisa hota hai. Baaki aap mujhe kya aa rahi hai?
Customer: Kya aa rahi hai?
Executive: Ma'am dekhiye ho jata hai. Kabhi kabhar dekhiye ma'am buyer deal hum sirf kya karte hain ki aapko buyleads de sakte hain. Par ma'am convert karna aapka kaam hai. But koi nahi ma'am hum isme bhi aapko help karenge jitni help hamari side se ho sakti hai, theek hai? Matlab mera kehna yahi hai ki aapko ek strong follow up rakhna padega buyers ke saath ma'am. Kyunki aapke alawa ma'am aur suppliers bhi unse connect ho rahe hain. Hai na ma'am? Dekhiye jaise offline competition hota hai ma'am, waise online bhi competition zyada hota hai, aap samajh sakte ho is cheez ko, theek hai? To aapko ek strong follow up lena padega ma'am, theek hai? Aap follow up karte rahiye. Jaha aapko lagta hai ki hamari help ki zarurat hai, hum aapko help karte rahenge. Main aapko apna WhatsApp number bhi share kar deti hu ma'am. In case koi issue hota hai phir se to aap mere WhatsApp number pe ek message kar dijiyega so that main aapko connect kar paau ya Tohid ko bhi kar sakte hain jaisa aapko theek lage ma'am. Ye kar sakte hain aap?
Customer: Okay okay. Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai na? Theek hai. Theek hai ma'am. Aapke aapke paas na mere liye ek feedback aayega to please apne according mere liye feedback share kijiyega.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Thank you so much. Thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- No clients reply to the customer.

- Client in buylead was a fraud.

- Customer has not received expected conversions.



Resolution:

- Executive advised to follow up with clients.

- Executive will ask Tohid to share buyleads.

- Executive shared her WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will ask Tohid to share buyleads.

- Customer will provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, follow up, fraud, conversion
